Unnamed: 8: Governance section of Qantas Group website

Unnamed: 4: The 17 UN SDGs are key to the UN’s 2030 Agenda for a better future for people and the planet. Our Sustainability Framework aims to support the achievement of the UN SDGs. We recognise that there are some SDGs where we have a greater ability to influence environmental and social outcomes. These are included in the list of material sustainability topics on page eight and referenced at the beginning of each key section of the FY23 Sustainability Report.
